'''兆''' ([[ちょう]], [[chō]])

# 10<sup>12</sup>, ''(US)'' trillion, ''(UK)'' billion (see: [[w:long and short scales|long and short scales]])
#:{{ja-usex|５０００'''兆'''円欲しい！|ご-せん-'''ちょう'''-えん ほし.い！|I want 5,000,'''000,000,000,000''' yen!}}

[[Category:Japanese numeral symbols|f]]
